extensionDescription.message: Provides UI in Tree Style Tab to start tab dragging for different purposes.

tooltip_detach_tree.message: Start dragging to detach this tree from the window

tooltip_bookmark_treeeee.message: Start dragging to bookmark this tree

tooltip_detach_solo.message: Start dragging to detach this individual tab from the window

tooltip_bookmark_solo.message: Start dragging to bookmark this individual tab
